title: President Donald J. Trump’s Administration is Working to Provide More Flexible, Affordable Healthcare Options for All Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
August 1, 2018
We will deliver relief to American workers, families, and small businesses, who right now are being crushed by Obamacare, by increasing freedom, choice, and opportunity for the American people.
						President Donald J. Trump					CREATING NEW HEALTHCARE PLANS: President Trump’s new rules on short-term, limited-duration health plans will increase health insurance options for Americans.PROVIDING OPTIONS: Short term, limited-duration health plans will help millions of Americans who were shut out of insurance markets due to Obamacare.DELIVERING ON PROMISES: President Trump has made delivering more affordable and flexible healthcare options and increasing healthcare freedom a key priority.
